pkgmetadata.longdescription: Birgitta is a Python ETL test and schema framework,providing automated tests for pyspark notebooks/recipes.Birgitta allows doing solid ETL and ML, while still liberallyallowing imperfect notebook code, enabling a`DataOps <https://www.dataopsmanifesto.org>` way ofworking which is both solid and agile, not killingData Scientist flexibility by excessive coding standards in notebooks.In addition to running recipetests on your local dev machine or ona CI/CD server, there is support for running recipetestsas [Dataiku](https://www.dataiku.com] DSS Scenarios.
